text: Grayce Hampton (March 28, 1876 – December 20, 1963) was a British film and stage actress. She emigrated to the United States, finding work on Broadway and then in Hollywood as a film actress in generally character roles such as the 1932 comedy The Unexpected Father.Stumpf p.136 ==Selected filmography== * The Pursuing Vengeance (1916) * The Bat Whispers (1930) * Broadminded (1931) * His Temporary Affair (1931) * Ex-Bad Boy (1931) * The Unexpected Father (1932) * Almost Married (1932) * Piccadilly Jim (1936) * The Shanghai Gesture (1941) * Nothing but Trouble (1944) * Three Sisters of the Moors (1944) * The Mating Season (1951) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Stumpf, Charles. ZaSu Pitts: The Life and Career. McFarland, 2010. ==External links== * Category:1876 births Category:1963 deaths Category:British film actresses Category:British stage actresses Category:British emigrants to the United States Category:Actresses from Devon
title: Grayce Hampton
